Posts.EditableText: Is there a way in the GUI, when on a page, to display a list of all the other pages linked to it?
Posts.HTML: Is there a way in the GUI, when on a page, to display a list of all the other pages linked to it?

Posts.EditableText:
At the bottom of the "page1" there is a section "options"
That list all the links to that page.
Unless there is something else you are looking for...
Posts.HTML:
At the bottom of the "page1" there is a section "options"
That list all the links to that page.
Unless there is something else you are looking for...

Posts.EditableText: I'm looking for something else. I'm not looking for a list of the links connected to the page, I'm looking for a list of pages that are linked to that page.
Posts.HTML: I'm looking for something else. I'm not looking for a list of the links connected to the page, I'm looking for a list of pages that are linked to that page.

Posts.EditableText:
OH... the other way!!!
Not where the page goes to, but what goes to that page!
Right?
There is a thread that talks about software that helps you write your story.
http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/squiffy/topic/fsioo0mileqgjmngcswmsq/how-do-you-keep-track-of-your-story
It may have a program that will pick out the page links both ways.
But not from in Quest... I think.

Posts.EditableText:
okay, thanks. I don't understand why the GUI doesn't make that available, since it knows the information. I've got a manual list, but it would be a lot more useful to have it inside the GUI

Is anyone on the team still working on programing the GUI?
